chara.textHome: I'm Ren... Um, Ren Isuzu. Yes...
I'm...um, not good at talking...

Uh... I can't always get out what
I want to say...so you might
get annoyed with me a lot...
I'm really sorry if that happens...

I...I just thought I should apologize
in advance...
I've decided what I want to be in the future.
I want to write a little, and draw a little...yes.
I think it's called being an essayist?
That would be lovely.

My life was supposed to have ended
back then, so... It feels kind of surreal
that I'm still here...

Being able to change and grow is...
one of the joys of living...

I only managed to live this long because
many people helped me...

So I need to face the life I've been
blessed with, with all my might...
Maybe even someone like me can change.

I'm still not confident...but...I want to become
someone who can count more joys and
moments of happiness than sad things...
I really do want to now...
Oh, h-hello!
I was...waiting for you...

U-um, no, what I mean is...
I'm not mad or anything...
I don't usually eat...breakfast...
I really can't eat anything in the morning.
Well... Sometimes I have an apple slice...

I wonder why... When I was alone...
I never felt hungry...even at lunchtime.
I like...studying, yeah....
I do like writing in my notebook...
Oh...but...
Maybe that's not exactly...studying...
I like going out...at night...
You know, for a short walk...

My parents tell me it's dangerous...
Yeah... They yell at me.
We have a computer room...at school...

The desk in the very back...
Yeah, that's my favorite place at school...
It's almost...time to leave, right?
Oh! Um...! Wait! Yeah...

I don't mean to rush you if
you're not ready to leave...
I'm not afraid...to fight... Yeah...
My body has already died once...
So...it would be silly to be afraid...
I like sunny weather, yeah...

Especially in the spring...or 
at the beginning of summer.
The sun is dazzling...and warm.
It sort of cheers me up...a little...
I like to write...
I don't write anything good, but... Yeah...
I write in my diary, and stuff...

I enjoy writing things down...
Yeah... I mean...
Don't you find words interesting?

You can learn a lot about a person's
personality by looking at how they write...

Recently I've been drawing some pictures...
They're in my diary.

That's why I've been collecting
 colored pencils...
Are people who...end their own lives...weak?

I think...it would be nice if you didn't
have to be strong...to live...

My parents...
They always tell me I look so...pale...

But when I get embarrassed...
Well, yeah...
My face gets as red as an apple.
Do I look weak?

Actually... I'm pretty healthy...
I barely ever catch colds...
I drink ginger tea and everything...
Before, I tried to...end my life.
But I couldn't do it...
That's why... I became a Magical Girl...
My Magical Girl outfit is a bit...different.
Yeah... It's pretty Japanese...
Or maybe a little ghostly...?
O-okay, here goes! Deep breath!
I did it! I...I won!
My heart…is still...pounding!
It's all about being alive, right?
My heart is pounding… because I'm happy!
N-nice to meet you!
I'm Ren Isuzu... Y-yes.

Um...s-sorry! I...I don't know what
I should say...right now...

I don't mind if it's just a little bit at a time,
I...just want to get better...
I'm so excited my heart is pounding.
Yes, I'm alive!
I bought a new diary...
Yeah, so I can continue writing a lot more...
Lately I've been thinking about the future...
Yeah... I mean, I planned to die before, so...

It's the first time I ever
really thought about it.

In the future...maybe...
I might like to work somewhere I can write.
Ah! B-but!
Please...keep this a secret, all right?
